metadata.title: CVE-2021-46243 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An untrusted pointer dereference vulnerability exists in HDF5 v1.13.1-1 via the function H5O__dtype_decode_helper () at hdf5/src/H5Odtype.c. This vulnerability can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
kissplice package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
paraview package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
xdmf package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
